mention.text: Former Italian Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi
the people of Crimea , who found themselves in difficult economic and political conditions , to ask Russia for support
The Russian military on the borders
a manifestation of the people s right to self-determination
A regular summit of the Group of Eight industrialized nations
